QuestData.Title: The Ritual of Binding
QuestData.Description: It is time for you to undergo the Ritual of Binding, $n. I will wait here as you speak with Kalandrios to begin the rite.$b$bDuring the ritual, you will experience the vision of the elements. Return to me when the ritual is complete, and we will speak more.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Kalandrios to begin the Ritual of Binding.
QuestData.CompletionText: Speak to me of your vision, $n. What mysteries did you behold?
QuestData.RewardText: <Vindicator Nobundo listens closely as you speak of your vision.>$b$bThese are grave images of which you speak, $n! If Cho'gall continues bleeding the naaru of its Light, K'ure will die and in the naaru's place a void god will emerge. Void gods are terrible creatures that live only to destroy!$b$bWe must travel to Oshu'gun immediately and put a stop to the threat of Cho'gall!
